## This is a test

```{shinylive-r}
#| standalone: true
#| viewerHeight: 600
library(shiny)
# library(bslib)
# library(dplyr)
# library(tidyr)
# library(readr)

# Load data from .rds (assuming "my_data.rds" is in your app directory)
data <- readRDS("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ALERRT-Research/PROJ_activeattack_website/tree/main/data/aa_data_clean_nogeo_2023.rds")

ui <- fluidPage(
  tableOutput("table")
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  
  data <- readRDS("data/aa_data_clean_nogeo_2023.rds")

  output$table <- renderTable({ data })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)

```


## End test
